short_definition: A list or docket of the judgments entered in a given court, methodically kept by the clerk or other proper officer, open to the public inspection, and intended to afford official notice to interested parties of the existence or lien of judgment.
long_definition_html: A list or docket of the judgments entered in a given court, methodically kept by the clerk or other proper officer, open to the public inspection, and intended to afford official notice to interested parties of the existence or lien of judgment.
long_definition_markdown: A list or docket of the judgments entered in a given court, methodically kept by the clerk or other proper officer, open to the public inspection, and intended to afford official notice to interested parties of the existence or lien of judgment.
long_definition_text: A list or docket of the judgments entered in a given court, methodically kept by the clerk or other proper officer, open to the public inspection, and intended to afford official notice to interested parties of the existence or lien of judgment.
